page.title: 11WELLS SAILING CLUB - NORFOLK
page.content: I belong to Wells Sailing Club. It was founded in 1913 and has maintained a steady membership ever since. Our fixtures are from Easter to mid October. The times of sailing are dictated strictly by the tides. The main fleet are Sharpies bualso have some Enterprises and Herons as well. Sharpies are the fastest and with the right wind can travel up to 10 knots. The Club has the usual facilities for entertaining. We have hosted both the British and European Sharpie Championships, plus many local sailing events. We have a challenge with Brancaster Sailing Club every year. We have won 16 times to their three times. We have a very good club indeed.
